import React from "react"; import {Container, Row, Col, Table} from "react-bootstrap"; import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; import DocumentMeta from "react-document-meta"; function NEETCompulsoryorNotforAbroadEducation() { const meta = { title: "NEET Compulsory or Not for Abroad Education", description: "Is the NEET compulsory for abroad admission, even if I don't want to work in India? After completing MBBS from abroad, if the students want to work in India, they need to qualify NEET exam.", canonical: "https://www.mbbsadmissionsinabroad.com/neet-compulsory-or-not-for-abroad-education", meta: { charset: "utf-8", name: { keywords: "NEET Compulsory or Not for Abroad Education" } } }; return (

NEET Compulsory or Not for Abroad Education

  • Is the NEET compulsory for abroad admission, even if I don't want to work in India?
  • Why Study Medicine Abroad
{/*

Germany is one of the best destinations to pursue MBBS at reasonable cost. Most students wish to{" "} study MBBS in Germany {" "} because it provides the best and the most affordable education options for international students. Germany has most of the top MCI approved medical universities/colleges. German medical colleges/universities offer high-quality medical education that provides Indian students a good exposure.

The best thing to{" "} study MBBS in Germany {" "} is that some medical universities in Germany allocate free education for international students. There is no requirement to give any entrance exam to study MBBS in Germany. The total duration of the MBBS in Germany with the best medical universities is 7.5 Years that includes internship with stipends. After completing MBBS in Germany, the candidates become eligible for permanent residence certificate.

*/}
{/* */}

Is the NEET compulsory for abroad admission, even if I don't want to work in India?

NEET compulsory for abroad admission

After completing MBBS from abroad, if the students want to work in India, they need to qualify NEET exam. NEET score card is not an eligibility criteria for taking{" "} admissions in abroad medical universities/colleges . Abroad medical universities/colleges ask for NEET score card at the time of issuing of Visa Invitation letter because of the MCI regulations provided to these universities.

However, if the students do not qualify NEET exam, they cannot practice medicine in India. If the students don’t give the MCI exam, they would be eligible to do work/study in the UK or Germany because the eligibility criteria of screening exam in these countries also needs the medical license of their home country i.e. India which they will only get after clearing the MCI exam.

Abroad medical universities which are recognized by the MCI provide an exciting opportunity to{" "} study medical education abroad at a reasonable fee . After completing MBBS from these universities, the graduates can come back to India, need to qualify MCI screening test, and start their medical practice in India.

Why Study Medicine Abroad

  • {" "} Skip the tough competition
    There are huge number of medical aspirants applies for admission to medical universities compared to the number of seats available in India. Even the students who get high NEET score are not able to get admissions due to tough competition. But if they have qualified NEET even with a low score, they can opt for studying MBBS in an MCI-recognized abroad medical university and skip the uncertainty and severe competition to get the MBBS seat in India.
  • {" "} No requirement for huge funds
    The fees structures of private medical universities in India are so high that even the students with very high NEET score may not get the admission due to financial constraints. But the students can study MBBS in abroad at very affordable fees with high-quality education.
  • {" "} Gateway to practice medicine in the United States
    Well-recognized abroad medical colleges follow international-standard US-based medical curriculum. Some medical colleges in abroad also provides support in the preparation of the United States Medical Licensing Examination (USMLE), a three-step examination for medical licensure in the United States. After USMLE qualification, the students are eligible to get medical license to practice medicine in India, the United States, and several other countries worldwide.
  • {" "} Easy admission procedure
    Various{" "} abroad medical universities {" "} provide a hassle-free, easy admission process. Apart from the NEET exam, there is no requirement of any entrance exam for taking admission in abroad medical universities.

Dr Vinit Kumar is a Educational Consultant for India & Abroad with more than 18 Years of Experience.He has an extensive background guiding & assisting medical students to find the best university as per their budget.✔3500 + Students✔ 15 Countries✔ MBBS, MBA, PG, UG✔ 100 % Commitment✔ Education Loan✔ Job Placements

); } export default NEETCompulsoryorNotforAbroadEducation
